name: Jyoti Chouhan
about: A young enthusiastic and passionate learner.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Objective: Improvement of the overall conversion rate for OYO vacation homes (Belvilla website) using google analytics tools • Modified 5 major website page trackers to add new events & formulated it into summaries for better analysis of the user journey• Fetched 10+ website tokens using WASP and modified the SQL queries to correct funnel data of trackers using google bigquery• Achieved 2% increase in the conversion rate by debugging major day on day drops for different website events using trackers
experience.description_html: Objective: Improvement of the overall conversion rate for OYO vacation homes (Belvilla website) using google analytics tools • Modified 5 major website page trackers to add new events & formulated it into summaries for better analysis of the user journey• Fetched 10+ website tokens using WASP and modified the SQL queries to correct funnel data of trackers using google bigquery• Achieved 2% increase in the conversion rate by debugging major day on day drops for different website events using trackers

experience.title: Python Development
experience.description: • Developed restful APIs using Python flask and PostgreSQL database to interact with the clinic-patient interface using their portals • Evaluated techniques to optimise web resources like webP image format and automated the compression and optimisation process • Developed an interface for migration of the patients and appointments data which allows import/export using the excel file format • Automated the sync of information related to the clinic and doctors across different online resources like Google My Business account
experience.description_html: • Developed restful APIs using Python flask and PostgreSQL database to interact with the clinic-patient interface using their portals • Evaluated techniques to optimise web resources like webP image format and automated the compression and optimisation process • Developed an interface for migration of the patients and appointments data which allows import/export using the excel file format • Automated the sync of information related to the clinic and doctors across different online resources like Google My Business account

experience.title: Executive Head
experience.description: • Devised the roadmap and executed an Ed-Tech solution to provide an interactive skill-based community for amateur programmers• Set-up a team consisting of trainers and mentors from top academic institutions in order to create customized value for the students• Generated an average of 25K/month as a result of optimal pricing mechanism, organic marketing techniques and user-focused output• Conducted an industry exposure webinar with people from different software companies in order to elevate the career motivation
